name: basic_string
description: Class template representing a sequence of characters.

functions.name: assign
functions.description: Assigns a new value to the string, replacing its current contents.

functions.name: at
functions.description: Accesses the character at the specified position in the string, with bounds checking.

functions.name: back
functions.description: Returns a reference to the last character of the string.

functions.name: begin
functions.description: Returns an iterator to the beginning of the string.

functions.name: cbegin
functions.description: Returns a const iterator to the beginning of the string.

functions.name: cend
functions.description: Returns a const iterator to the end of the string.

functions.name: clear
functions.description: Erases all characters from the string.

functions.name: compare
functions.description: Compares the string with another string.

functions.name: copy
functions.description: Copies a substring of the string to a character array.

functions.name: crbegin
functions.description: Returns a const reverse iterator to the beginning of the reversed string.

functions.name: crend
functions.description: Returns a const reverse iterator to the end of the reversed string.

functions.name: data
functions.description: Returns a pointer to the underlying character array.

functions.name: empty
functions.description: Checks if the string is empty.

functions.name: end
functions.description: Returns an iterator to the end of the string.

functions.name: erase
functions.description: Erases a character from the string at the specified position.

functions.name: find
functions.description: Finds the first occurrence of a substring in the string.

functions.name: front
functions.description: Returns a reference to the first character of the string.

functions.name: insert
functions.description: Inserts one or multiple copies of a character into the string at the specified position.

functions.name: length
functions.description: Returns the number of characters in the string.

functions.name: operator+=
functions.description: Appends another string to the current string.

functions.name: operator+=
functions.description: Appends a character to the current string.

functions.name: operator=
functions.description: Assigns a new value to the string, replacing its current contents.

functions.name: operator[]
functions.description: Accesses the character at the specified position in the string.

functions.name: pop_back
functions.description: Removes the last character of the string.

functions.name: push_back
functions.description: Appends a character to the end of the string.

functions.name: replace
functions.description: Replaces a substring of the string with another string.

functions.name: resize
functions.description: Resizes the string to contain a specified number of characters.

functions.name: rbegin
functions.description: Returns a reverse iterator to the beginning of the reversed string.

functions.name: rend
functions.description: Returns a reverse iterator to the end of the reversed string.

functions.name: reserve
functions.description: Reserves space for a specified number of characters in the string.

functions.name: shrink_to_fit
functions.description: Reduces the capacity of the string to fit its size.

functions.name: size
functions.description: Returns the number of characters in the string.

functions.name: substr
functions.description: Extracts a substring from the string.

functions.name: swap
functions.description: Swaps the contents of two strings.
